title: Early in a demographic transition - rapid growth

content.prompt: Which of the following describes the changes in a countryâ€™s demographics as it begins its transition from a preindustrial state to an industrial state?

choices.label: Population increases rapidly, birth rate declines, death rate increases
Population increases rapidly, birth rate declines, death rate remains high
Population decreases rapidly, birth rate declines, death rate decreases
Population decreases rapidly, birth rate remains high, death rate increases
Population increases rapidly, birth rate remains high, death rate decreases

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
